visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Monthly Average Rainfall', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark gray color (#333) for axis labels and titles, with a font size of 14px. Data series: Two series with the same data: [49.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4]. Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green for the columns. Additional configurations: Enable 3D options with alpha: 15, beta: 25, depth: 50, and viewDistance: 25. Set the chart margin to 75 pixels.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D column chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes two data series with identical data points, each representing monthly rainfall values. The axes and titles are styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px for readability. The columns are colored using a gradient from blue to green, enhancing visual appeal. The 3D options are enabled with specific angles and depth settings to give the chart a three-dimensional appearance. The chart's margin is set to 75 pixels to ensure sufficient spacing around the plot area.
